unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition, especially from institutions like IIT Delhi. Dr. Sharma's insights on engaging fresh graduates are valuable. We’ve successfully onboarded candidates from Tier-2 colleges in UP, filling key roles in the Gurgaon office. Focus on skills relevant to fintech. The budget for campus recruitment is Rs. 5 Lakhs this year. The office space expansion is planned for an additional 2000 sq ft to accommodate new hires. Looking forward to a productive season.
